textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure no file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/yum.repos.d exists and matches pattern ^gpgcheck\h*=\h*0\h*(\h+.*)?$
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/yum.repos.d exists and matches pattern ^gpgcheck\h*=\h*0\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named .*\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*\$FileCreateMode\s+0[6420][40]0\s*(\s+#.*)?$
Ensurefile(s) named .*\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*\*\.\*\s+@

file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --xrwxrwx

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*(?i)(allow|deny)(users|groups)\h+"?\H+"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*LogLevel\h+"?(QUIET|FATAL|ERROR|DEBUG|DEBUG1|DEBUG2|DEBUG3)"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*UsePAM\h+"?no"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitRootLogin\h+"?(yes|prohibit-password|forced-commands-only)"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*HostbasedAuthentication\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitEmptyPasswords\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitUserEnvironment\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*ignorerhosts\h+"?no"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*LoginGraceTime\h+"?(0|6[1-9]|[7-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9][0-9]+|[^1]m)\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*MaxSessions\h+"?(1[1-9]|[2-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9][0-9]+)\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ClientAliveCountMax\h+"?0\b
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/sudoers.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\!authenticate\b(\.*)?$
